title: Remembering the crash of 6/12/05 11:53 pm
content:
The day that the Board crashed was devisating to many..
I remember the fact that I had a cat that died the same day [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

But come on folks the Keen Generation 2006 is almost here!!!
In order to survive keen needs to:

* I could say I knew the guy with the rights to keen... How could this help?

* I am close to starting the releasing of KEEN 3D demo
(HELP PLEASE!!!)

Now that 2006 is close this is the topic to release YOUR ideas for keen!

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img] Keen says:"Dont let ID keep you down!"

title: Re: Remembering the crash of 6/12/05 11:53 pm
content:
Personally I don't wait any Keen generation of 2006, only the cool stuff there will be released.

I'm sorry about your cat. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] Losing a pet is not nice.

* Well, it doesn't make you any cooler in my eyes if you've known the guy. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] You probably mean Keen Dreams, since iD owns the rights to the other games. As well, doesn't help much that you knew him, since he still owns the rights. Also, Keen Dreams rights wouldn't help Tom making a new Keen game, since as far as I know those are just the rights to distribute and sell the specific game (Keen Dreams in this case).

* Well, good luck. Haven't heard of you working on that project.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Remembering the crash of 6/12/05 11:53 pm
content:
This board crashed?

Sorry about your cat.

* What guy? Be more specific.

* Cool! (insert infinite [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] s here)Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
Tough guys have no table manners![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]

title: Re: Remembering the crash of 6/12/05 11:53 pm
content:
i'm sorry that you lost your cat, i would feel exactly the same way as you right now[quote]Quote:[hr]Woe to you Oh Earth and Sea
for the Devil sends the beast with wrath
because he knows the time is short
Let him who hath understanding
reckon the number of the beast
for it is a human number
its number is six hundred and sixty six.[hr][/quote]

title: well,
content:
Well, a lunitic bent on world destruction hacked it and ruined all the posts on 99.9% percent of ezboards forums, like a really old post it would say:

This post Is missing and could not be retored,

I remember that ezboard sent me a letter,

qoute
Hi BP,
Thanks for your note.

We are still at it and are not stopping until every bit of data we can restore is restored.
I'll be sure to pass your kind words to the staff.
Have a better weekend.
Rob,

I wrote,
On Jun 3, 2005, at 6:55 PM, bp wrote:
I think it is great that your doing this, the public commander keen forum is in the overcome of ruin...I will also have my agents on the case I was losing comunication on boards across the ezboard network,members of the forum I visit lost most of there posts-I lost everyone that I posted since I'm a new member...If there is any way I could help any more I am willing to try,
-a concerned user, bp
end qoute

Well I was young when I wrote this, [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]
So there is that,
and the OLD topic, [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-freud.gif[/img]
